scripts.publish-dev: pnpm build && pnpm -r publish --tag dev --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.publish-preview: pnpm build && pnpm -r publish --tag preview --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.publish-prod: pnpm build && pnpm -r publish --tag latest --access public --no-git-checks
scripts.test:sandbox:crud: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run sandbox-crud
scripts.test:sandbox:fs: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run filesystem
scripts.test:sandbox:process: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run process
scripts.test:sandbox:previews: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run previews
scripts.test:sandbox:lifecycle: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run lifecycle
scripts.test:sandbox:volumes: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run volumes
scripts.test:sandbox:sessions: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run sessions
scripts.test:sandbox:codegen: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run codegen
scripts.test:sandbox:interpreter: cd tests/sandbox && npx vitest run interpreter
